definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: He sent the letter by air mail, so that it might reach them in good time.
sentences.chinese: 我用航空郵件發出這封信，以便他們及早收到。

sentences.english: Can I have this letter airmailed to New York ?
sentences.chinese: 哦，還有一件事，這封信可以用航空郵件寄往紐約嗎？

sentences.english: Bacon every time One day, Mr. Bacon received airmail from Jack.
sentences.chinese: 一天，培根先生收到了來自傑克的航空郵件。

sentences.english: It usually takes about 7 days by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 寄航空郵件通常需要7天左右的時間。

sentences.english: It usually takes about 5 working days by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 航空郵件一般需要5個工作日。

sentences.english: The draft for aircraft is sent to the airline by airmail.
sentences.chinese: 訂購航空器的匯票用航空郵件寄給了航空企業。

sentences.english: I didn't know whether to send the letter airmail or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否送航空郵件。

sentences.english: How long does this letter take to go there by airmail?
sentences.chinese: 這封信用航空郵件寄，多久才能到？
